Aspataal mein log khane jaate hain.
Chidiya ghar mein log rehte hain.
Bandron ki barish ho rahi thi.
Rajasthan mein paani ki kami nahi hai.
Chennai mein bahut thand lagti hai.
Chamakte hue taaron ke saath mat khelo.
Dakshin Bharat mein roti khaya jaata hai.
Kaam to raat mein hi karna chahiye.
Jhoot ki hamesha jeet hoti hai.
